text: Hof is a German city in the north of Franconia. The next bigger cities are Coburg, Bayreuth and Chemnitz. The population of Hof is 44,000. It is surrounded by, but not part of, the district of Hof, so it has its own local council. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Cities in Bavaria Category:Upper Franconia
title: Hof, Bavaria
